message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand that you're still looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $102. This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $98. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a deal at that price.

I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I'll make one more counteroffer to try to get closer to my desired price. I'll sell the product to you for $101. This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. I'll pay $99 for the product. I think that's a fair price, and I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
